title: TRACK3R
description: Build and program this multi-purpose robot to get familiar with EV3

cards.title: Build EV3 Robots
cards.description: Build five cool robots: TRACK3R, R3PTAR, SPIK3R, GRIPP3R, and EV3RSTORM. You can program R3PTAR to slither like a snake, SPIK3R to catch a bug, GRIPP3R to grab an object, EV3RSTORM to search and destroy, and so much more.
